name: India
interestingFacts: India is the world's largest democracy.
The game of chess originated in India.
India has the second-largest population in the world.

name: Japan
interestingFacts: Japan has more than 6,800 islands.
It is home to the world’s oldest company, founded in 578 AD.
Vending machines are extremely common in Japan—there’s one for every 23 people.

name: Brazil
interestingFacts: Brazil is the largest country in South America.
It’s home to the Amazon Rainforest.
Football is the most popular sport in Brazil.

name: Canada
interestingFacts: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
It has two official languages: English and French.
More than half of the lakes in the world are located in Canada.

name: France
interestingFacts: France is the most visited country in the world.
It is the birthplace of cinema.
The Eiffel Tower was originally intended to be dismantled after 20 years.

name: Australia
interestingFacts: Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
It has more kangaroos than people.
The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system.

name: Germany
interestingFacts: Germany is known for its engineering and automobile industry.
It is home to over 1,500 types of sausages.
Oktoberfest in Munich is the world’s largest beer festival.

name: Egypt
interestingFacts: Egypt is home to the ancient pyramids and the Sphinx.
The Nile is the longest river in the world.
Hieroglyphics were the formal writing system of ancient Egypt.
